backend/main.mo: Actor defining products, enquiries, feedback, messages, user profiles, site settings, and access-controlled CRUD logic with sorting utilities and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report mapping admin-login, route-guard, and passkey verification changes to their affected frontend files with metadata and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing major frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and admin features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global UI element styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with metadata, favicon, and root mount point loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, themes, and all public and admin routes including guarded admin sections.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button that clears admin session and query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter a name and save their profile via backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing logo, quick links, contact info, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper rendering top navigation, main outlet, footer, WhatsApp button, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Responsive navigation bar with links, logo, login button, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/whatsapp/WhatsAp: Floating WhatsApp button that opens a prefilled chat using site settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instances tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Polls until the actor is ready after login and provides a utility for promise‑based readiness checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides admin session checks, passkey verification, and user profile fetch/save operations using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for products, enquiries, settings, and mutations using the backend actor with admin session checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity, global styles, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard with tabbed navigation for managing products, enquiries, and site settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEnquiriesP: Standalone page that renders the admin enquiries panel.
Displays all enquiries with confirm and reject actions, using dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminFeedbackPa: Fetches and lists customer feedback in a table with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Provides the admin dashboard layout, navigation, route-based rendering, and logout handling.
Handles admin passkey verification and redirects authenticated admins to the requested page.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMessagesPa: Loads and displays contact form messages in a table with error and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Wrapper page rendering the products management panel.
Manages product listing and creation with a form dialog, file upload, and mutation logic.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRouteGuard: Protects admin routes by redirecting locked users to login and allowing access when unlocked.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Admin settings UI that loads site settings, edits fields, parses pricing table text, and saves updates via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTwoStepAcc: Renders a passkey input form for admin access with validation, error display, and submit handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdvantagesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of HDPE pipe advantages using icons and cards, setting the page title on mount.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form that sends messages via API, validates inputs, and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, feature highlights, navigation buttons, and an about section.
frontend/src/pages/OrderEnquiryPage.tsx: Implements an enquiry/order form with validation, file upload support, minimum quantity checks, and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays products with images, details, and availability indicators, showing skeletons while loading.
Shows a grid of HDPE pipe applications using icon cards and sets the page title.
frontend/src/utils/adminCredentials.ts: Defines the hard‑coded admin passkey and provides a verification function.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Manages admin session unlock state using sessionStorage with change notifications and logout helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the admin passkey login rebuild, requirements, and current issue tracking.
